function.description:

Validate any email address, including all syntax, format consistency, and deliverability. Also checks internationally accepted domain names and normalizes addresses.

function.name: email_validator._email_validator_validate
function.description:
Validate email address. Key features:
1. Checks that an email address has the correct syntax
1. Gives friendly error messages when validation fails.
1. Checks deliverability of an email address.
1. Supports internationalized domain names and 
1. Normalizes email addresses

function.name: email_validation_and_verification.bolt_on_emailverified
function.description:
Comprehensive Email Validation Service
Validate any email address, including all syntax, format consistency, and deliverability.
Also checks internationally accepted domain names and normalizes addresses.
Choose to enable or disable auto-correction for specific addresses.
Finds friendly error messages to provide valuable insights.
Incorporates a quick development tool for expedited integration.
Comparing to simpler validation services, such as `validate_email.validate_email`, our service offers more comprehensive checks and additional features like auto-correction.

auto_correct.description: You can chose to disable auto correct. To do so, just input  **false** for the auto correct param. By default, auto_correct is turned on.

function.name: email_validator._email_validator_validate
function.description:
Validate email address. Key features:
1. Checks that an email address has the correct syntax
1. Gives friendly error messages when validation fails.
1. Checks deliverability of an email address.
1. Supports internationalized domain names and 
1. Normalizes email addresses

function.name: email_validation_and_verification.email_verify_api
function.description:
Broad-Range Email Validation and Verification API
Validate any email address for syntax.
Including format consistency, deliverability, domain normalization and internationalized domain names normalization.
Choose whether or not to enable auto-correction at the address level.
The service provides friendly error messages for improved developer workflow insight.
No built-in development tool is needed as integration can be done on demand.

auto_correct.description: You can chose to disable auto correct. To do so, just input  **false** for the auto correct param. By default, auto_correct is turned on.
